metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0675 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: In certain situations it is possible for an unmanaged rule to exist on the target system that has the same comment as the rule specified in the manifest. This could allow for unmanaged rules to exist on the target system and leave the system in an unsafe state.

criterions.comment: puppet-module-puppetlabs-firewall package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
